name: Swap Force (OccamsLazer)
description:
Swap Force is a top down shooter where the player must take control of enemies to defeat overwhelming odds. Defeat your enemies by taking control of units. 

Developed by Samuel Shin and Carter Andrews

Sound Credits: dj-Jo/Zenpaku (music), Partners in Rhyme (FX), Diangleo (FX),  and Little Robot Sound (FX).
